mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(d.dg_no) as dCount, m.biz_no as bizNo FROM biz_dangol d RIGHT JOIN biz_mem m ON d.biz_no = m.biz_no GROUP BY d.biz_no, m.biz_no ORDER BY d.biz_no
SELECT count(d.dg_no) dCount, m.biz_no FROM biz_dangol d RIGHT JOIN biz_mem m ON d.biz_no = m.biz_no WHERE d.biz_no = 'bn001' GROUP BY d.biz_no, m.biz_no ORDER BY #{bizNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM biz_dangol WHERE dangol_ymd BETWEEN SYSDATE - 10 AND SYSDATE
SELECT b.*, m.* FROM biz_dangol b, mem m WHERE b.user_id = m.user_id AND b.biz_no = #{bizNo}
